## Workflow

Load colrectr

```{r}
library(colrectr)
devtools::load_all()
```

Read Excel file specifying path and sheet.
```{r}
colrect(path = "../inst/extdata/clustered.xlsx",
        sheet = "降水量",
        col = 3)
```
